structure.unit: RIOT, DISORDERLY CONDUCT, AND RELATED OFFENSES

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (b) of this subsection, harassment is a violation.
Harassment, as defined in paragraph (a) of subsection (1) of this section, is a Class B misdemeanor.

law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 345, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 217, effective January 1, 1975.
